EmailTemplate.description: Email to all awaiting availability Candidates-Australia
EmailTemplate.name: AA Aus-April HT TOUR 2020
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to apply for this Job Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Just checking in to see if you’re still keen on pursuing teaching in the UK? We have some exciting opportunities coming up that I would like to personally invite you to. If you’re keen to find out more click on the links below:
You’re invited- UK Principal Tour of Australia- April 2020. Teach in are excited to announce an Australian ‘UK Principal Tour’ this April. If you, or someone you know, would like to meet and interview with a top UK Principal, then it is time to book in.
Australian Webinar Feb 5th, 5pm AEST. Ready to find out more about what we offer our teachers? We have a Webinar coming up. Register to join the webinar, listen in and ask questions.
If you’re sick of reading, then click on the videos to see what our teachers say!.
You can also follow us on social Instagram and Facebook pages.
Here’s a quick reminder of what Teach in can offer you?
Great schools, across England (not just London!) through exclusive partnerships Direct employment, contract and Guaranteed supply contracts. A free flight to the UK ( up to the value of $900 AUD) Support and advice from teachers with UK experience- personal and professional. The correct pay! Looking forward to hearing back from you, with your updated plans.
Best regards,
{!Contact.TR1__Secondary_Owner__c}
